createNewDeposit(address,address,address.details: This should be called by an approved contract, not a developer

exitCourtesyCall().details: Only callable if collateral is sufficient and the deposit is not expiring

getCurrentState().details: We implement this because contracts don't handle foreign enums well
getCurrentState().return: The 0-indexed state from the DepositStates enum

increaseRedemptionFee(bytes8,bytes8).details: This sends us back to AWAITING_WITHDRAWAL_SIGNATURE
increaseRedemptionFee(bytes8,bytes8).return: True if successful, False if prevented by timeout, otherwise revert

notifyCourtesyCall().details: Calls out to the system for oracle info

notifyCourtesyTimeout().details: This is treated as an abort, rather than fraud

notifyFraudFundingTimeout().details: This is not a funder fault. The signers have faulted, so the funder shouldn't fund

notifyFundingTimeout().details: This is considered a funder fault, and we revoke their bond

notifyRedemptionProofTimeout().details: This is considered fraud, and is punished

notifySignatureTimeout().details: This is considered fraud, and is punished

notifySignerSetupFailure().details: We rely on the keep system punishes the signers in this case

notifyUndercollateralizedLiquidation().details: Calls out to the system for oracle info

provideBTCFundingProof(bytes,bytes,uint2.details: This is the happy-path of the funding flow. It means that we have suecceeded

params._bitcoinHeaders: An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers
params._bitcoinTx: The bitcoin tx that purportedly contains the funding output
params._index: The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (1-indexed)
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block

provideBTCFundingProof(bytes,bytes,uint2.return: True if successful, False if prevented by timeout, otherwise revert

provideECDSAFraudProof(uint8,bytes32,byt.details: ECDSA is NOT SECURE unless you verify the digest

params._preimage: The sha256 preimage of the digest
params._signedDigest: The digest signed by the signature vrs tuple

provideFraudBTCFundingProof(bytes,bytes,.details: We reward the funder the entire bond if this occurs

params._bitcoinHeaders: An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers
params._bitcoinTx: The bitcoin tx that purportedly contains the funding output
params._index: The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (1-indexed)
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block

provideFraudBTCFundingProof(bytes,bytes,.return: True if successful, False if prevented by timeout, otherwise revert

provideFundingECDSAFraudProof(uint8,byte.details: ECDSA is NOT SECURE unless you verify the digest

params._preimage: The sha256 preimage of the digest
params._signedDigest: The digest signed by the signature vrs tuple

provideRedemptionProof(bytes,bytes,uint2.details: The signers will be penalized if this is not called

params._bitcoinHeaders: An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers
params._bitcoinTx: The bitcoin tx that purportedly contain the redemption output
params._index: The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (1-indexed)
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block

provideRedemptionSignature(uint8,bytes32.details: The signers will be penalized if this (or provideRedemptionProof) is not called
provideRedemptionSignature(uint8,bytes32.return: True if successful, False if prevented by timeout, otherwise revert

provideSPVFraudProof(bytes,bytes,uint256.details: We strong prefer ECDSA fraud proofs

params._bitcoinHeaders: An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers
params._bitcoinTx: The bitcoin tx that purportedly contains the funding output
params._index: The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (1-indexed)
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block

purchaseSignerBondsAtAuction().details: For interface, reading auctionValue will give a past value. the current is better

requestRedemption(bytes8,bytes20).details: The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption tx

params._requesterPKH: The 20-byte Bitcoin pubkeyhash to which to send funds

retrieveSignerPubkey().details: We store the pubkey as 2 bytestrings, X and Y.

createNewDeposit(address,address,address.notice: The system can spin up a new deposit

exitCourtesyCall().notice: Goes from courtesy call to active

getCurrentState().notice: Get the integer representing the current state

increaseRedemptionFee(bytes8,bytes8).notice: Anyone may notify the contract that a fee bump is needed

notifyCourtesyCall().notice: Notify the contract that the signers are undercollateralized

notifyCourtesyTimeout().notice: Notifies the contract that the courtesy period has elapsed

notifyDepositExpiryCourtesyCall().notice: Notifies the contract that its term limit has been reached

notifyFraudFundingTimeout().notice: Anyone may notify the contract no funding proof was submitted during funding fraud

notifyFundingTimeout().notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the funder has failed to send BTC

notifyRedemptionProofTimeout().notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a redemption proof

notifySignatureTimeout().notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a signature

notifySignerSetupFailure().notice: Anyone may notify the contract that signing group setup has timed out

notifyUndercollateralizedLiquidation().notice: Notify the contract that the signers are undercollateralized

provideBTCFundingProof(bytes,bytes,uint2.notice: Anyone may notify the deposit of a funding proof to activate the deposit

provideECDSAFraudProof(uint8,bytes32,byt.notice: Anyone can provide a signature that was not requested to prove fraud

provideFraudBTCFundingProof(bytes,bytes,.notice: Anyone may notify the deposit of a funding proof during funding fraud

provideFundingECDSAFraudProof(uint8,byte.notice: Anyone can provide a signature that was not requested to prove fraud during funding

provideRedemptionProof(bytes,bytes,uint2.notice: Anyone may provide a withdrawal proof to prove redemption

provideRedemptionSignature(uint8,bytes32.notice: Anyone may provide a withdrawal signature if it was requested

provideSPVFraudProof(bytes,bytes,uint256.notice: Anyone may notify the deposit of fraud via an SPV proof

purchaseSignerBondsAtAuction().notice: LIQUIDATION  Closes an auction and purchases the signer bonds. Payout to buyer, funder, then signers if not fraud

retrieveSignerPubkey().notice: we poll the Keep contract to retrieve our pubkey
